mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transport ( employeeID, workMonth, startDate, startStation, endStation, transportFacility, transportExpense1, midStation1, transportFacility1, midStation2, transportFacility2, midStation3, transportFacility3, transportExpense2, transportExpense3, transport, businessTrip, status, insertDate ) VALUES ( #{employeeID}, #{workMonth}, #{startDate}, #{startStation}, #{endStation}, #{transportFacility}, #{transportExpense1}, #{midStation1}, #{transportFacility1}, #{midStation2}, NULL, #{midStation3}, NULL, NULL, NULL, COALESCE(CAST(#{transportExpense} AS DECIMAL(10,2)), 0) + COALESCE(CAST(#{transportExpense1} AS DECIMAL(10,2)), 0) + COALESCE(CAST(#{transportExpense2} AS DECIMAL(10,2)), 0), #{businessTrip}, '0', DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d') )
mapper.select: SELECT w.workStartDay, w.workEndDay, w.workTime, t.workMonth, t.startDate, t.startStation, t.endStation, t.transportFacility, t.transportExpense1, t.midStation1, t.transportFacility1, t.midStation2, t.midStation3, t.transport, t.businessTrip FROM ems.transport t LEFT JOIN ems.workinfo w ON w.workMonth = t.workMonth WHERE t.employeeID = #{employeeID} AND t.workMonth = #{workMonth} AND w.contractID = ( SELECT contractID FROM ems.contract WHERE employeeID = #{employeeID} AND status = '1' )
mapper.update: UPDATE transport SET startDate = #{startDate}, startStation = #{startStation}, endStation = #{endStation}, transportFacility = #{transportFacility}, transportExpense1 = COALESCE(CAST(#{transportExpense1} AS SIGNED), 0), midStation1 = #{midStation1}, transportFacility1 = #{transportFacility1}, midStation2 = #{midStation2}, midStation3 = #{midStation3}, transport = COALESCE(CAST(#{transport} AS SIGNED), 0), businessTrip = COALESCE(CAST(#{businessTrip} AS SIGNED), 0), updateDate = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d') WHERE employeeID = #{employeeID} AND workMonth = #{workMonth}
